title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete prayer on the Black Stone in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing supplication to the Black Stone in a dream. Many people may see themselves in front of the Black Stone in a complete dream, and many may also pray to God in their dream. Today, we have collected for you, our beloved followers, all the true and correct meanings that we have collected for you from great books and scholars of dream interpretation and visions. What is the complete interpretation of seeing praying on the Black Stone in a dream? Interpretation of dreams about touching the Black Stone and praying in a dream full of good news and sustenance with an abundance of wealth and blessings. Seeing the Black Stone and praying in front of it in a dream is absolutely good news that he will travel to perform Hajj or Umrah. Also, seeing praying with the Black Stone in a dream is full of praiseworthy visions promising comfort and happiness. It is known that seeing the Black Stone in a dream completed is generally a symbol of ending Problems, worries and troubles. Seeing the Black Stone and crying in front of it in a dream is a sign of comfort and relief from the anguish and distress that one suffers from. What is the interpretation of seeing praying on the Black Stone for an ordinary woman? Seeing a woman standing in front of the Black Stone in a dream indicates that she will achieve her desires and goals in life. It is also one of the dreams that has great omens of goodness, blessing, and long life. It also indicates relief from worries. Seeing a woman praying to the Black Stone in a complete dream means that she will marry a suitable person who will be the reason for her happiness. Kissing the Black Stone in a dream is complete for a woman. Married woman: The black stone in a married woman’s dream indicates that God will bring her and she will have a good heir. Praying in front of the black stone in a complete dream for a married woman is evidence that she will soon end her problems and improve her life. Seeing complete begging with the husband in a dream and the wife afflicted with an illness, this indicates recovery Seeing a black and white stone in a dream is complete. The interpretation of seeing a black stone on a white one in a dream indicates bad deeds and serious mistakes committed by the dreamer. This dream also explains the problems and obstacles that the dreamer will face in his life and he will have to improve his affairs quickly. Also, seeing The inability to see the Black Stone in its entirety indicates that the person is the one who has broken off his prayers. The complete disappearance of the Black Stone in a dream. Some interpretive scholars have suggested that seeing the Black Stone completely disappear in a dream is a sign of tragedies and troubles. This vision shows some of the problems that the dreamer will face, as it is his life and loss. One of the important things.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing spider webs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing spider webs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing spider webs in a dream indicates the presence of submissive people, especially friends. Also, seeing a spider’s nest in a dream indicates a lot of money and food, and also indicates deception and evil, and it is one of the dreams that is not Sometimes pleasant. Also, seeing spider webs in a dream for men means achieving goals, regardless of their distance, and achieving success and ambitions for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of seeing spider webs in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing spider webs, this indicates the pursuit of success and excellence in Her scientific and practical life. Also, seeing spider lines and their arrangement in a dream indicates the collapse of problems and worries, and it also indicates a good marriage soon for an unmarried girl. Seeing a spider in a dream for an unmarried girl may indicate many problems and fears and that she will be deceived and betrayed by those who Before her dear friends. Seeing a spider bite and sting in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she is planning dishonest things and indicates a conference and machinations from her friends. Interpretation of seeing spider webs in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is cleaning spider webs to beautify the appearance of the house, this indicates Removing her worries. Also, seeing spider webs in a married woman’s dream indicates good treatment of her, which indicates her obedience to her husband and her repentance to God Almighty. Also, seeing many spider webs in a dream indicates the coming of kindness and well-being for her husband and the new job in which she will participate. If A married woman saw spider webs in her dream. This indicates the stability of her marital life and the elimination of marital disputes between her lover. Interpretation of seeing spider webs in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees spider webs in her dream, this means that she will give birth and that she will give birth easily and naturally. Also seeing Spider webs being cleaned in a dream means that her husband left and then returned him to her. It also indicates that she is moving to a larger house. This vision shows the safety and security of the newborn, God willing, and it also indicates that he will be exposed to problems but will overcome them. Interpretation of seeing spider webs in a dream For a man: If a man sees spider webs in a dream, this indicates the removal of worries, the stability of his life, and the completion of the text of his religion, which is the husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing spider webs in a dream indicates that he has some problems and fears, but he will overcome them all, God willing. Interpretation of seeing him cleaning dust And spider webs in a dream indicate his superiority in life, and the abundance of sustenance and profit in his trade, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the ceiling from spiders in a dream: Seeing yourself cleaning the ceiling at work in a dream is one of the good visions and indicative of achieving goals and fulfilling desires and goals. Interpretation of a dream Cleaning the roof of the house from spider webs is evidence that a man will get rid of his marital problems. Cleaning the house from spider webs

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a pigeon in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a pigeon in a dream for a married woman: Pigeons are considered one of the best types of birds that one can see in a dream, because in most cases its interpretation is beneficial to humans, while in other cases it can carry connotations that bring comfort. Therefore, when a married woman sees a dove in her dream, she searches for its interpretation, and we explain the meaning of seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman. Jurists say that seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman is good for her, if she finds it flying in front of her or cooking it for her family. There are other beautiful occasions to see a dove, such as seeing a white dove. When a woman sees a small dove in her dream or eggs, scholars indicate her immediate pregnancy, God willing, while a pregnant woman when she sees a dove in her vision expresses that she has already given birth to a boy, God willing. I know. But if he found a dove in front of him and someone tortured him and seriously injured him and he felt that he was going to die, then the dream is interpreted as a break in the relationship that it brings with his partner and many harmful and bad things. This is for their relationship. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. One of the signs of seeing a dove for a married woman is that it symbolizes peace and tranquility and avoiding all marital or practical obstacles, even if her husband is traveling and sad because of his distance from her and she sees a lot of doves. Which flies in her sight, so his return is close to home. Ibn Sirin promises a woman who sees white or small pigeons abundance to achieve what she wants, whether they are dreams related to her work or her desire to have a new child, but there are bad signs that can appear in the dream related to pigeons, Such as torture in the vision or killing him, it shows some cruel qualities that you commit, committing some mistakes in reality, and mistreating others. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Google Dream Interpretation on the Internet. Seeing a slaughtered dove in a dream for a married woman. A slaughtered dove in a dream can be considered a symbol of a group Of things. Psychologically, experts indicate that it indicates falling into multiple crises, which leads to a woman’s feelings changing into sadness and anguish most of her time. This, of course, affects her children and her husband, and her family relations are not good, but some explain that slaughtering pigeons and cooking them after cleaning them is good, as it expresses the repayment of debt, success at work, and abundance of money, God willing. Seeing raw pigeons in a dream for a married womanWhen a woman finds a dirty pigeon in her dream , it means many unfavorable signs, including that she treats some people in a bad and unfair way. Cooking is successful for her with the comfort she feels with her family and her husband’s good behavior with her. Seeing a dead dove in a dream for a married woman is not good for a woman to see the presence of a dead dove in her vision, and if it is present in the house, it symbolizes many difficult events and may live in her family. A dead dove may also indicate for a married woman the many difficult circumstances she faces, c

title: Interpretation of a dream about avocado for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about avocado in a dream for a man and a woman. Seeing avocado in a dream is a sign of many good things for the intruder. Interpretation of a dream about avocado in a dream, which is considered one of the good dreams that a person can see in his life, because seeing fruit in a dream indicates many signs. The goodness and abundance he receives. A man in his life, who sees avocados in a pregnant woman’s dream, witnesses the comfort and ease of childbirth, the safety of the newborn and the enjoyment of good health. Interpretation of a dream about avocados for a man: Scientists explained this vision to the man based on what he saw in the dream. The explanations are summarized in the following lines: If a man sees in a dream that he is drinking avocado juice, this means that the man has great wisdom and a great relationship between people. If one is dreaming or thinking about traveling and sees a green avocado in his pajamas, this means that he will travel soon, by God. I know. And if a man in pajamas sees a rotten avocado in his pajamas, this means that the man will harm him or get sick, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an avocado. There are indicators for this vision that differ according to what the opinion sees. The interpretation of a dream about avocado for one girl is summarized in the following lines: Interpretation of a dream about avocado In the dream, if a girl eats an avocado and it tastes delicious, this means the goodness that this girl will receive in her dream. If the girl is a student and sees this vision, this indicates her great excellence in studies. Interpretation of a dream about avocado in a dream. If there are many problems in a girl’s life and she sees an avocado in her dream, this means that the problems will end soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about avocado for a married woman. The interpretation of this vision for a married woman was as follows: If it was a dream that a married woman sees that she is eating Avocado, it means stability in married life and a good relationship between her and her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking a cup of avocado juice, this indicates the abundant goodness that she will receive in the near future, which she must maintain until it lasts. If the woman Pregnant and sees herself buying avocados from the market, this means that she will give birth to a boy. In the case of avocados in the lady’s house, this means stability in the house. Interpretation of seeing an avocado tree in a dream for a single woman. Seeing avocados means good and happy news. If you see yourself eating avocados in a dream, this means You are overcoming problems and fears. Eating avocado also indicates good luck for the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about green avocado for pregnant women. Seeing an avocado in a dream for a pregnant woman means ease and ease of childbirth, safety for the newborn and enjoyment of good health. Avocado also shows an abundance of nutrition and many benefits for the viewer. Interpretation of a dream Drinking avocado juice for a womanInterpretation of a dream about avocado in a dream To see avocado juice in a dream for someone means good news. Avocado juice also indicates solving problems faced by the fortuneteller. Avocado juice also indicates good luck and achieving

title: Interpretation of buying and removing shoes in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of buying and removing shoes in a dream for a married woman, there are many forms of shoes that have different meanings and endless interpretations in dreams. The difference in the shape of the shoe means a difference in interpretation, although most dreams can be a wish and general thoughts that revolve in a person's mind, but this does not prevent them from being meaningful at times and can be interpreted, so in this In today's article, we will learn about the interpretation of buying and removing shoes in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a shoe for a married woman in a dream, Ibn Sirin's interpretation Since these dreams differ in their interpretations according to what was mentioned in the interpretation books and what Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen left, let's take a look at the most important of these visions: A married woman's dream that her husband gives her new shoes indicates that she will soon become pregnant with her child. New shoes in a married woman's dream symbolize happiness, food and kindness that fills her life. But if a married woman sees an old shoe in her dream, she is a woman. This symbolizes the emergence of someone who causes quarrels between her and her husband. And a married woman's vision of new shoes. It shows the differences that surround her and may destroy her small family, but if she sees that she is taking a shoe from a man, this indicates that there are those who want to harm her in her personal life, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a married woman in a dream wearing black shoes means that she will find a good job that she loves and dominates, but if the shoe is golden. This is good news that bodes well for all good things, as it indicates advancement in a job position or the acquisition of a very valuable inheritance. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream Married Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen provides several interpretations of a married woman's vision of shoes. And he classified them according to their sizes and how comfortable or tight they feel. Below we take into account the most important of these interpretations that came for this dream: Ibn Shaheen indicates that seeing tight shoes in a married woman's dream indicates the tightness of her life and condition. As for seeing yourself wearing high heels in a dream. This symbolizes success and advancement in administrative positions. Interpretation of seeing a gift of shoes for a married woman Interpretation scholars believe that a child's shoe in a dream symbolizes the short appearance of pregnancy or may indicate a lack of emotion in his life, insecurity, insecurity, and ignoring his feelings. A married woman's dream in a dream of getting new shoes indicates the love and overwhelming passion that enters the life of a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of taking off shoes for a married woman The dream of taking off your shoes in a dream symbolizes getting rid of fears and getting rid of the cloak of all problems. As for taking off the shoes at the door of the house, this symbolizes the exit of the married woman from her home, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of buying shoes for a married woman Seeing glass shoes in a dream for a married woman means that she knows the value of time well and preserves it. As for seeing a married woman's wooden shoes: it shows her attachment to her home and preserving it. In conclusion, it is mentioned that dreaming of shoes is a strange and rare thing, so

title: Learn about the interpretation of a red car in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, the interpretation of a dream about driving a red car and the interpretation of a dream about buying a red car in a dream.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a red car in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a new red car in a dream? What do contemporary researchers say about seeing a red car driving in a dream? What exactly does it mean for a single woman, married, pregnant, divorced, man and a man to see a red car in a dream? Red car in a dream Jurists differed in interpreting the dream of a red car, and these are the most accurate clues they quoted about the red car symbol: Meanings of seeing the auspicious red car Whoever lived miserable and lonely for many years of his life in reality, and saw that he was driving a beautiful red car and felt joy while in it, this is a sign that he breaks the feeling of loneliness and finds a life partner and soon marriage. If the dreamer loses his sense of self-confidence and strength in reality and sees that he is driving a car Fast red in a dream, then he will face his problems and be self-confident and bold, and from now on he will not run away. His provisions for the next few moments. If the dreamer suffers from lethargy and laziness in reality and always postpones today's tasks and responsibilities until tomorrow, and this behavior has a destructive effect on his life, and he sees in a dream a luxurious red car and is able to drive it perfectly, then the scene suggests activity and vitality And a radical change in the personality of the viewer. Bad meanings of seeing a red car. If the dreamer is driving a red car with a person in a dream, and this car overturns in it, then the vision indicates a strong disagreement between the dreamer and this person, and their relationship may break up, and God knows best. If the dreamer collides with a red car In a dream and it collapsed on the road, the scene indicates crises that prevent the dreamer from reaching the career success he wants, and the vision can be interpreted as an emotional failure that befalls the dreamer. The red car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The car and all modern means of transportation were not interpreted by ancient jurists, so the symbol of the red car will be interpreted based on its color and the way it is driven as follows: If the dreamer drives the red car on a road full of dangers in a dream, but he manages to Of coming out of this way without getting hurt or upset, this is a sign that the dreamer is in control of his feelings and emotions and therefore he will succeed. And achieving great achievements, God willing. But if the dreamer sees that he cannot control the red car that he was driving in the dream, this is a warning, as he is letting his emotions and desires control him and direct him in ways that are not in his favor and will bring him problems. As for the red color, it indicates turmoil, turmoil, and entering into many crises and conflicts in life, so the symbol of the red car is not favored by Ibn Sirin. The red car in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Fahd Al-Osaimi said that the red car in the dream means ugly and indicates conflicts and harassment that may occur in social life. For the dreamer. If a married man is driving a red car with his wife in a dream, this is a sign of the turmoil that is permeating their relationship, and if the car overturns with them in the dream, then they are about to...
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a red car in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a new red car in a dream? What do contemporary researchers say about seeing a red car driving in a dream? What exactly does it mean for a single woman, married, pregnant, divorced, man and a man to see a red car in a dream? Red car in a dream Jurists differed in interpreting the dream of a red car, and these are the most accurate clues they quoted about the red car symbol: Meanings of seeing the auspicious red car Whoever lived miserable and lonely for many years of his life in reality, and saw that he was driving a beautiful red car and felt joy while in it, this is a sign that he breaks the feeling of loneliness and finds a life partner and soon marriage. If the dreamer loses his sense of self-confidence and strength in reality and sees that he is driving a car Fast red in a dream, then he will face his problems and be self-confident and bold, and from now on he will not run away. His provisions for the next few moments. If the dreamer suffers from lethargy and laziness in reality and always postpones today's tasks and responsibilities until tomorrow, and this behavior has a destructive effect on his life, and he sees in a dream a luxurious red car and is able to drive it perfectly, then the scene suggests activity and vitality And a radical change in the personality of the viewer. Bad meanings of seeing a red car. If the dreamer is driving a red car with a person in a dream, and this car overturns in it, then the vision indicates a strong disagreement between the dreamer and this person, and their relationship may break up, and God knows best. If the dreamer collides with a red car In a dream and it collapsed on the road, the scene indicates crises that prevent the dreamer from reaching the career success he wants, and the vision can be interpreted as an emotional failure that befalls the dreamer. The red car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The car and all modern means of transportation were not interpreted by ancient jurists, so the symbol of the red car will be interpreted based on its color and the way it is driven as follows: If the dreamer drives the red car on a road full of dangers in a dream, but he manages to Of coming out of this way without getting hurt or upset, this is a sign that the dreamer is in control of his feelings and emotions and therefore he will succeed. And achieving great achievements, God willing. But if the dreamer sees that he cannot control the red car that he was driving in the dream, this is a warning, as he is letting his emotions and desires control him and direct him in ways that are not in his favor and will bring him problems. title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing money in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing money in a single woman's dream: Money is a necessity that cannot be overlooked. With them, we can get anything from food, drink, clothes, etc., and when we see them in a dream, it contains hints and signs that help us know the meaning of the dream and what will return to the good fortune teller and good news or humans, so we will do that through our article and this displays the largest number Among the cases related to this symbol, in addition to the opinions and interpretations of major scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing money in a single woman’s dream: Seeing money in a dream for single people has many connotations and signs that can be identified through the following cases: If an unmarried girl sees money in a dream, this symbolizes... The problems that she will face in the coming period and that she will overcome with ease. Paper money in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a lot of sustenance and a lot of money that she will obtain in her life. An unmarried girl who sees gold coins in her dream indicates that she will fulfill her long-awaited desires and dreams. Seeing money in a single woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of single women seeing money in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations given in this regard: Money in an unmarried woman’s dream, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizes her success and superiority that she will achieve in her life in the practical field. And scientific. Money in a single woman’s dream may indicate her anxiety about the future, which is reflected in her dreams, and she needs to calm down and rely on God. An unmarried girl who sees money in a dream is a sign that her situation will change for the better if she suffers from a lack of livelihood. Seeing paper money in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing money and paper in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: Money in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her great ambition and desires that she seeks to achieve and she will succeed. If she sees a girl If an unmarried woman sees paper money in a dream, this symbolizes her imminent marriage to a very wealthy and religious young man with whom she will be very happy. Seeing 200 British pounds in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes her victory over her enemies and the return of the right that was stolen from her. Seeing a lot of money in a single woman’s dream if You dream of an unmarried girl who sees a lot of money, then this indicates that she will acquire great wealth from a lawful inheritance. Seeing a lot of money in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will get rid of the troubles and problems that disturbed her life in the previous period. A single girl who sees in The dream that she receives a large sum of money indicates great discoveries that will happen to her in the near future and will change her life for the better. Seeing yourself giving money in a dream to a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that someone is giving her money and she is sad indicates that there are some people around her who harbor malice and malice. She must be careful

title: What does it mean to see a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans What does it mean to see a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi? The horse is one of the most common animals in many people's dreams, but the horse has good interpretations for people. It is the original Arab animal that runs in various races on foot, but in its eyes the horse has good skin, or tell me more about the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream. The horse always shows an abundance of food, kindness and always a blessing, but perhaps the appearance of a horse in a dream has other interpretations, For example: Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding a horse. The interpretation of the dream is often that the sleeper has plenty of food, and God knows best. As for the one who dreams that he is riding a horse without wearing a bridle or saddle, then in the interpretation of the dream, God knows that the sleeper will soon marry a woman without a maid. Interpretation of seeing a truck No one rode it. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a group of horses that no one is riding or riding, and they are walking freely with the horses here, and God knows best, and they are a group of women who have gathered either to attend a wedding or a funeral. . Or burial, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a tied horse. Whoever sees a horse tied in a dream or suffering from its shackles in the interpretation of the dream, and God knows that the sleeper is suffering from many problems, stress and tension. As for who dreams of her? Kill the horse. Interpretation of the dream and God knows that the sleeper will soon get food. Or hope or strength. As for the one who dreams that he is riding someone else’s horse, it is possible here that the horse indicates that the sleeper will acquire the status of the original owner of the horse. As for the one who dreams in his sleep, he is accompanying the horse. The interpretation of the horse here is that the sleeper heralds the upcoming journey. Interpretation of a dream about grazing Horse. As for someone who dreams of taking care of a horse or a horse in a dream, this is a good skin and evidence that God provides for him from where he does not expect, because the horse is a common good. Interpretation of a female horse: Whoever sees a female in a dream, the horse here indicates that his wife is one of the most noble women in character and knowledge. And God knows best. Interpretation of riding a winged horse in a dream: This dream is considered one of the very common dreams in the world of dreams. In general, this dream is often interpreted as receiving a lot of power, inheritance, or marrying a beautiful woman. As for the one who dreams that he has been bitten by a horse In a dream with a horse here, this indicates that the sleeper will become a very great leader in the army, especially since the truck was one of the most important rides in the wars of the past. We told you many interpretations of seeing horses in a dream, whether the sleeper dreams that he is a rider or a companion or that the horse or The horse bites him, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing thorns in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing thorns in a dream, and these thorns are found in plants such as roses and cactus, and because cactus has the most thorns and pricks, thorns appear in different parts of the human body, hands and body. Surely you have some interpretations that indicate suffering, unhappiness and difficulties in the body, and in a dream thorns appear problems and fears, in addition to wrong actions, we will list the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing thorns in a dream, follow us. The dream of seeing thorns for Ibn Sirin As Ibn Sirin explained when he saw thorns, it symbolizes the ignorant and the fanatics, and seeing thorns is the fatigue of life and suffering, as well as the presence of enemies in the dreamer's life, disobedience and disobedience. A dream that a man sees thorns Seeing thorns in a man's dream indicates psychological disturbances and problems. Seeing yourself walking on thorns indicates financial problems and debts. Seeing a person putting thorns on his body indicates that there are many problems and many sins. And the dream of removing thorns is evidence of the disappearance of troubles and problems and settling debts, it is evidence of repentance from sins. Dreaming of seeing thorns for a married woman If a married woman sees herself walking in a field of thorns in her dream, this means that she suffers from ongoing psychological problems. However, if he sees that the plants Green is planted after finishing the thorny field, this indicates that the problem is over and the benefits are being reaped. The same applies to picking thorns in the dreams of a married woman, which indicates problems, worries and many problems. Seeing thorns in a dream indicates the problems and concerns that the dreamer faces. Seeing yourself removing thorns in a dream means getting rid of problems and troubles. Thorns also indicate the difficulty of childbirth. Dreaming of seeing single thorns Seeing a girl walking on a thorny path indicates many hardships, difficulties and challenges that she will face in her life. Seeing thorns piercing her clothes and body indicates physical, mental and psychological damage. As for seeing a girl's shoe pierced with thorns, this indicates that her life is in the wrong direction, and that she is suffering from pain and suffering. If a single woman dreams that she is removing thorns, this means that her problems will disappear and anxiety and pain will go away. Seeing thorns entering the girl's feet indicates the hardships and tribulations she faces. If you remove these thorns, this means that you have passed the difficult stages and will be free from problems. A dream to see Thorns for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman’s dream about thorns indicates exhaustion and suffering, and if she sees that she is pulling the thorns, this indicates the end of torment and pain except for her safety and that of her fetus. A dream about seeing thorns coming out The vision of a tree being trampled indicates exhaustion and suffering in the dreamer’s life. Such as debts and critical situations that he is exposed to. Removing the board from the foot in a dream means getting rid of judgments and debts. Seeing thorns in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness and instability. The vision also indicates the difficult stages that the dreamer is going through. Seeing the
